/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds that add a sense of tranquility to the scene. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Power lines crisscross above, forming an intricate web against the sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars parked along the side of the road add a touch of modernity to the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
